Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, durability, and the time and effort put into its creation. Considering its immense value and benefits, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $10500. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
